term.title: polymolecularity correction

item.text: A correction applied to relationships between a property and the molar mass or relative molecular mass, obtained from polymers non-uniform with respect to relative molecular mass, in order to obtain the corresponding relationship for polymers strictly uniform with respect to relative molecular mass.
